Package com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees

Class RedBlackTree<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees.RedBlackTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of value stored in the tree.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<T>
public class RedBlackTree<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object implements Iterable<T>
A Red-Black Tree implementation.
